<template>
  <button @click="inc">Add-2</button>
  <button @click="increase({ value: 11 })">Add-11</button>
</template>

<script>
import  { mapActions } from "vuex";

export default {
    methods: {
      // addOne() {
      //   // this.$store.state.counter++
      //   this.$store.dispatch("increment")
      // }
      // ...mapActions(["increment", "increase"])
      ...mapActions({
        inc: "increment",
        increase: "increase"
      })
    },
  }
</script>
